name: Night Realm's Gift: Heart of Unity
title: Kachina: Heart of Unity
in_play_description: When Turbo Twirly or Turbo Twirly: Let It Rip is triggered, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kachina to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
When Turbo Twirly or Turbo Twirly: Let It Rip is triggered, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kachina in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
